en.title: [2022] Salaries & Wages
en.description: Annual salary and wage statistics, with breakdowns by key demographic and socioeconomic dimensions.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest annual salary and wage data, with breakdowns by key demographic (sex, age, ethnicity) and socioeconomic (occupation, skill level, industry, sector) dimensions.

bm.title: [2022] Gaji & Upah
bm.description: Statistik gaji dan upah tahunan, dengan pecahan mengikut ciri-ciri demografi dan sosioekonomi utama.
bm.description_email: DOSM baru sahaja menerbitkan statistik gaji dan upah tahunan terkini, dengan pecahan mengikut ciri-ciri demografi (jantina, umur, etnik) dan sosioekonomi (jenis pekerjaan, tahap kemahiran, industri, sektor) utama.
